section: . A yellow TCAS FAIL annunciation message is shown in the TCAS data block on the right side of the Map and HSI if the TCAS system is failed. A TCAS that is turned off is considered failed. TCAS OFF is displayed when the trafﬁc mode is standby, alt on, or alt off. Failures related exclusively to the trafﬁc display cause this message to be shown when the TCAS overlay is selected.
raw_text: HSI: Weather Radar Overlay Fault Annunciation
